root.name: Avatar: The Last Airbender - The Burning Earth
root.description: OverviewAvatar: The Last Airbender - The Burning Earth was the second Avatar video game. It is available for a variety of platforms, but most notoriously for the Xbox 360 in which it is possible to earn all 1000 achievement points in less than a minute. The Burning Earth features a multiplayer mode, and multiple playable characters. The game covers the second volume of the Avatar TV show, the Book of Earth. Playable Characters Aang Sokka Toph Katara ZukoIrohJetMomoAppaXbox 360 Game InstallationAvatar: The Last Airbender - The Burning Earth requires 5.1GB of space to install on an Xbox 360 HDD. Xbox 360 Games on DemandOn March 23, 2010, Avatar: The Last Airbender - The Burning Earth became available on the Xbox 360's Games on Demand service. It costs $19.99 or 1600 Microsoft Points.
